It's a great way to keep up with the world and impress your friends with how busy you are.

You need to register (it's free), which you can do here and then subscribe to the Slate options you want (yes, yes, that's free too), which you can do right here . Then you'll no longer need to waste those valuable seconds spent waiting for the elevator.
You'll need Windows Media Player software (which you may already have if you've installed the latest version of Internet Explorer).
Also books, chocolates, and other essentials of life.
